name: Brit
Description: Want to get an invite to any impromptu party in town? Brit's your gal. keep in touch with her. Please.

name: am.i.Will
Description: COOLEST GUY EVER, YOU WANT TO BE AND STAY BEST FRIENDS FOREVER. LOREM IPSUM STUFF STUFF STUFF STUFF STUFF STUFF

name: wi.i.Am
Description: will.i.am's offbrand metaverse persona. Not that fun but you still want to stay in touch.

name: Stein
Description: For when you need help with the math and physics problems. And haircare tips.

name: gal
Description: A cool gal round the block. You will always wave and hang out when you have nothing else to do. She makes good cookies and recommends the best books and movies.
